ComicInfo.Penciller: Jim Lee,Richard Bennett,Terry Dodson,Travis Charest,Jim Lee,Terry Dodson
ComicInfo.Summary:
Story 1: The Hunt
The WildC.A.T.s arrive in Washington, DC, in a restaurant that is actually a front as a base for the Coda. Hightower is meeting some Coda, to hire them, when the WildC.A.T.s attack. Void teleports all the innocent customers out of there, but the sheer amount of people proves to be too much and collapses in fatigue. She then gets a sudden vision of the future, involving people she is not even affiliated with. Meanwhile, Hightower leaves the restaurant and the Coda fight the WildC.A.T.s, and the Coda finds themselves losing. They retreat to the cellar where they will detonate a bomb, and it explodes. However, the WildC.A.T.s survive the explosion, but are faced by Stormwatch.
Story 2: Wing And A Prayer
A back-up story involves a past adventure of Savant.
ComicInfo.Title: Hard Hunt; Wing And A Prayer
